items.sentence: This book is even more interesting than that one.
Tom, there\'s something you should know about me.
Tom wasn\'t surprised when he saw Mary in Boston.
Tom wasn\'t the first person the police arrested.
Tom wasn\'t wearing socks, so his feet were cold.
Tom wasn\'t with Mary. He was with somebody else.
Tom has just found out that he\'s Mary\'s father.
Tom told Mary to make sure that she wasn\'t late.
I know what I want. I just haven\'t found it yet.
I like grapes, but I can\'t eat too many of them.
